english: They had learned to give up many things .
chinese: 他们已习惯放弃很多东西了。

english: I refuse, sir, to give up the scholarship .
chinese: 先生，我决不放弃奖学金。

english: These claims were later departed from .
chinese: 这些请求后来又被自动放弃了。

english: There was nothing left but to resign him .
chinese: 没有别的办法，只能放弃他。

english: Her abandonment of the idea upset him .
chinese: 她放弃了这一意见，他很不高兴。
放弃造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Give up our tea  break ? no way !
chinese: 让我们放弃工间休息时间？没门儿！

english: Boniface had to moderate his claims .
chinese: 庞尼菲斯不得不放弃他的主张。

english: The vicar soon abandoned the struggle .
chinese: 教区牧师很快就放弃了这场角逐。

english: The plan will most  probably be abandoned .
chinese: 这项计划很可能被放弃。

english: It must renounce its claim to special rights .
chinese: 它必须放弃它的一切特权。

english: I will bargain no more, i withdraw .
chinese: 现在我不再讨价还价了，我自愿放弃。

english: I can't love you unless i give you up .
chinese: 只有放弃你，我才能爱你。

english: But in paris he dropped his medical studies .
chinese: 但是在巴黎，他放弃了学医。

english: You have thrown up a very promising career .
chinese: 你放弃了一个很有前途的职业。

english: She did not give up her job when she got married .
chinese: 她未因结婚而放弃工作。
